summary: A successful fashion journalist inherits a farm in the deep south of Italy. She goes there to sell it, but not all goes as planned.
cast: Raoul Bova|Sergio Rubini|Liz Solari|Pietro Sermonti|Nino Frassica|Giulia Michelini|Sabrina Impacciatore|Neri Marcorè|Paolo Sassanelli|Mia Benedetta|Emilio Solfrizzi|Rolando Ravello|Maurizio Mattioli|Anna Rezan|Dino Abbrescia|Kendall O'Rorke|Ann Rezanni|Grazia Daddario|Isabella Briganti|Corinna Agustoni|Chiara Celino|Antonio Manzo|Emy Bergamo|Giovanni Ramunni|Federico Prodon|Lilia Pierno|Simone Dell'Anna|Gaetano D'Amore
keywords: scorpion|lego|farmhouse|reference to audrey hepburn|reference to breakfast at tiffanys
title: ¿Nunca has estado en la luna?
